parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: AcceleratorType
parameters.description:
The type of the Global Accelerator (GA) instance to be queried. Valid values:

*   **basic**: basic GA instance
*   **standard**: standard GA instance

parameters.name: BusinessRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the acceleration region to be queried.
